how_to_participate: Join Radyo.ai by Login with your facebook or Google account and add audios to any of the available categories. Once the audio is published, you get points everytime when the audio is played or liked on radyo.ai or everytime you get a new follower. Invite your friends, share your audio with friends and family and score high.
prizes_to_win:
Top 10 creators with maximum scores every month will win Amazon/Paytm cash prize of Rs 500 each (i.e. a total of Rs 5000/- amazon/paytm cash prizes every month will be distributed to creators on Radyo.ai)
Results will be published on radyo.ai on the first working day of subsequent month.
terms_and_conditions:
Audios shall be of your own, original and authentic. Appropriate attribution should be given to the original creator if you are re-using any aspect of their work. You should not be breaking into the system to increase your scores. Radyo.ai team reserves all rights to disqualify your candidature should they found anything unethical.
